name: Snow Raider
description:
HOW TO PLAY

----------------------------------------------

Controls

Use the MOUSE to move around the screen.

Use the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to perform a Normal attack.

Use the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to perform a Snow attack.

Use ESC to return to the MENU at any point.

Use ENTER to pause the GAME at any point.

----------------------------------------------

Pickups

Orange Pickup: Fills up your Fuel (Can only be obtained when killing a frozen enemy)

Purple Pickup: Gives you 1 ammo of Snow attack.

Green Pickup: Powers up your basic attack, you can now shoot in 3 directions.

Yellow Pickup: Powers up your basic attack, you can now shoot Laser.

Blue Pick up: It gives you a shield that can sustain 4 attacks.

----------------------------------------------

Enemies

RED BOI: Moves around the map and has a 20% chance of dropping a Snow Bullet.

FAN BOI: Targets your location, use a snow bullet to end his whole career!

GREEN BOI: Suicidal bomber
